original_title: Minister’s report to remove PUCSL Chairman presented to Parliament
original_body_lines: The report of the Finance Ministry to remove Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) Chairman Janaka Rathnayake was presented to Parliament by  Chief Government Whip Prasanna Ranatunga today.
Minister Ranatunge said the minister's report was presented in terms of Clause 7 of the Public Utilities Commission Act.
